Question: SCRIPTOR ARTIS SAS CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
SCRIPTOR ARTIS

Product: Devana.ai at CES 2024

- Devana.ai offers advanced fact-checking features for reliable and operational AIs, a world first
- It also provides a unique feature for scoring reliability and innovation, for in-depth qualification of information
- Devana.ai transforms the relationship with information and AI, offering unmatched configuration freedom and focus on reliability
